Desc.entry: A registered charity which promotes the study and conservation of insects and invertebrate animals in South Yorkshire and North Derbyshire and supports the invertebrate collections at Weston Park Museum. Provides informal training to interested people. Organises surveys of insects in Sheffield and carries out the Sheffield Butterfly Survey.

Pubs.entry: Insects of Barnsley; Sheffield Butterfly Atlas; Moths of Sheffield; Hoverflies of Sheffield; Millipedes of Sheffield; Water Beetles and Water Bugs of Sheffield; Bees and Wasps of South Yorkshire; Ground Beetles of Sheffield

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Field meetings and surveys held throughout the summer. Details in Sorby Newsletter and on website
